newsitem.title: USA: U.S. Spring/White Wheat - Wheat price skid ends.
newsitem.headline: U.S. Spring/White Wheat - Wheat price skid ends.

text.p: A sharp increase in basis bids halted the recent skid in wheat prices in the northern Plains and Pacific Northwest wheat markets, but farmers largely ignored the price rise and continued planting, dealers said.
"I anticipate this is what we will see for the next 10 days," said a Minnesota dealer of the active plantings.
New-crop spring wheat sales were slow.
"It's hard for farmers to sell what they don't see coming out of the ground," a Minneapolis dealer said.
Spring wheat planting began this week in the recently flooded Red River Valley, dealers there said.
Montana wheat planting was nearing completion and some emerged wheat near Roundup, north of Billings, was being stressed by dry conditions.
Price per bushel for 14-pct protein dark northern spring, durum and white wheats, in dollars per bushel:
Spring Chg Durum(m) Chg White Chg
Spring Chg HRW 13pct Chg White Chg
